data.title: Who is Melissa Womer? All you need to know about Jim Carrey's first wife
data.meta_description: Melissa Womer is an actress and film producer from New York, United States. Check out this post to know more about her life, career, and more. Where is she today?
data.text:
Melissa Womer is an American actress and film producer. She is best known for playing the role of the comedy store waitress in Man on the Moon. Her fame escalated when she married Jim Carrey, a prominent comedian. The two got divorced after about eight years of marriage.

Who is Melissa Womer?

Melissa Jaine Womer is an actress and film producer known for her roles in Petrocelli (1974) and The Rise of King Asilas (2017). She garnered much public attention from her marriage to Hollywood superstar Jim Carrey.

How old is Melissa Womer?

Melissa Womer's age is 64 years as of August 2024. She was born on 8 July 1960, and her Zodiac sign is Cancer.

She was born and raised in New York, United States of America. Her nationality is American, and her ethnicity is White.

Her early life was troublesome as she was born into a dysfunctional family. She faced many problems, such as substance abuse, mental illness, and domestic violence.

Is Melissa Womer still alive?

Yes, Jim Carrey's first wife is still alive. While she is in the entertainment industry, she keeps her life away from the media.

Educational background

Melissa completed basic education in a local school in New York before transiting to university. She enrolled and graduated from the University of Kansas, attaining a bachelor's degree.

While in school, Melissa got a chance to showcase her prowess in comedy. She worked as a writer for the Q104 radio show in Kansas to earn some money.

Career

After graduating, Melissa Womer moved to Hollywood, California, to pursue new opportunities. She landed a job as a cocktail waitress at a Sunset Boulevard comedy club.

After working at the comedy store for a while, she was allowed to showcase her comedic antics at an open mic night. Over time, she gained popularity in the area because of her humorous nature.

Having mustered confidence as an entertainer, Melissa Womer soon began auditioning for roles in movies and television shows. She made her acting debut in 1974, landing a role in the film Petrocelli.

The movie opened up new avenues for her, and she landed roles in other films, such as Man on the Moon. She is credited as an executive producer of Real Stories of Donut Men and Yesterday Show with John Kerwin.

Melissa Womer's net worth

Melissa Womer's net worth remains undisclosed in the public domain, particularly because she is a pretty private person. On the other hand, her ex-husband's net worth is publicly known. Celebrity Net Worth reports that Jim Carrey's net worth is $180 million.

Melissa Womer and Jim Carrey's relationship

Melissa Womer and Jim Carrey were in a romantic relationship. They got married but are now divorced. Jim is a famous actor, comedian, and artist. The Hollywood actor has been in the entertainment industry for over three decades and has won over 50 awards for his work.

Melissa Womer first met Jim at Sunset Boulevard Comedy Club. She was working at the comedy store at the time.

Jim worked two jobs, one at a comedy store and as a masseuse at a health club in Los Angeles. The two were struggling and not financially stable then. They began dating shortly after meeting. The relationship blossomed, and the couple got married after a year of dating.

The former lovebirds wedded in California. They exchanged wedding vows on 28 March 1987 at the Hotel Mahi-Mahi in Santa Monica, California, and Melissa became Jim Carrey's wife.

Jim Carrey's daughter with Melisa, Jane Erin Carrey, was born on 6 September 1987. Carrey and Melissa divorced in 1995.

Is Jim Carrey still married to Melissa Womer?

No, Jim Carrey and Melissa Womer got divorced in 1995. Jim cited irreconcilable differences as the primary reason for the split.

The famous actor claimed their busy work schedules brought cracks in their marriage. Some people accused Carrey of ditching his wife once he became a star. He allegedly paid over $3.5 million in divorce settlements.

After the divorce, the two successfully co-parented their daughter. They tried their best to give her as normal an upbringing as possible and even sent her to public school.

They largely kept Jane out of the spotlight throughout her childhood. Even so, she joined Jim Carrey for a few red-carpet events.

The famous actor and comedian remarried after parting ways with his first wife. On 23 September 1996, he married actress Lauren Holly.

During an appearance on the Late Show with David Letterman in 1994, the actor and producer used comedy to tactfully deal with the subject of his alleged fling with Holly. His second marriage lasted less than a year.

From 1999 to 2000, he was engaged to actress Renée Zellweger. The two called off their engagement later.

In 2002, he was in a relationship with January Jones. In 2005, he met model and actress Jenny McCarthy. The two made their relationship public in June 2006. They ended it in April 2010 and remained good friends.

In 2012, the actor and comedian met Cathriona White. White is a makeup artist from County Tipperary, Ireland. They dated from 2012 and 2015.

On 28 September 2015, White was found dead from ingesting a prescription medicine in high doses. Carrey was a pallbearer at her funeral in Cappawhite, County Tipperary, Ireland.

In January 2019, the famous actor and comedian dated Ginger Gonzaga. The couple split after less than a year of dating.

Jim Carrey retired from the spotlight in 2022 to focus on his family and his passion for art. He treasures his relationship with his only daughter, Jane Erin. He talked about his relationship with his daughter.

My daughter is one of the most brilliant counsels of my life. Honestly, she is so wise and so loving...she brought me back from the brink a couple of times. Well, she just has chimed in with a few words that have really, like, opened my heart and settled me down and made me feel like everything's alright. She's just wonderful.

Where is Melissa Womer now?

Melissa Womer is still based in the United States of America. Following her divorce, she preferred to maintain a low profile.

How tall is Melissa Womer?

Jim Carrey's ex-wife stands at 5 ft 7 in or 170 cm tall. She weighs about 130 lbs or 59 kg and has dark brown eyes and blonde hair.

Trivia

Melissa Womer's body measurements are 36-25-36 in.

She has a grandson named Jackson Riley Santana.

She supported Carrey immensely as he tried to establish his career as a comedian.

Although she got divorced in 1995, some people still refer to the actress as Melissa Carrey.

Her daughter, Jane Erin Carrey, is a singer and actress. She was a contestant on American Idol.

Melissa Womer is best known as Jim Carrey's first wife. She and her ex-husband got divorced in 1995. They share an adult daughter.
